name: Border (FerlibtJack)
description:
Tom is a detective. The best and the youngest in the town. He used to live a peaceful life alone. He only live for the crimes and for catch the killers. But one day, he got a shot in his head by an anonimous person. 

After that his life has changed. 

He sees the people who were killed in the murder.

Help Tom and solve the crimes!

Investiagate every furniture, picture and any subject in the game! Maybe you can find something interesting...

Features:

  • Auto-update system----> you don't have to download the newest version of the game, because it will update automatically if you have internet (only works on PC for now)
  •  Mind map, where you can follow Tom's thinking through every single crime
  • Interactive story, where you can choose what do you want to investigate first
  • More and more complicated crimes in every 4h update
  • And more features that you can you can discover if you play this game!

Planned features:

  • Custom made graphics
  • Epic musics and sounds
  • More complicated crimes
  • Mini games
  • Epic main story
  • Side storys
  • And more other epic features!

If you want to see more games like this or just want to see what this game will become, support me here: https://www.patreon.com/ferlibtjack

I hope you will have fun!
